1.content:
Youve just downloaded the app and opened it, youve signed in with facebook(like you would on any app when youre excited). You are met first with a warning;"once changed, it is up to your owner to turn you back to being human, there is no time limit, if they refuse to change you back or forget about needing to, you will be stuck" you skim over the warning and mindlesly hit accept, you are then met with a menu, 2 options, selection and random. You imediately go for random, throwing caution to the wind, but it simply flashes you a message: "you must have minimum of 1 previous transformations to use this option". Oh well, you think, i guess ill have to pick my first owner then. With that you tap on the other option. 4 options come up, 4 female options, each looked to die for(which might happen, who knows) each had a bar below them with a word in it, for someone well known the bar said "fame" for someone who wasnt in the public eye the bar was simply empty, the app was a work in progress so you shrugged and moved on to making a choice, you examined your 4 choices:
